heading: Diablo 4 Patch 1.1.0 for Season 1: Buffs, Nerfs, Massive Changes!
content: Today, the Diablo team dropped a mega update on us with Patch 1.1.0 in preparation for Season 1! You're going to need your morning coffee all over again because it's huge! Massive amounts of buffs, nerfs, game mode and mechanic adjustments, and more to bring the game into a more settled state. Here are some high level quick takes before diving in to the notes. GL;HF! have been discovered in Sanctuary. Use them to enhance your characters in the Eternal or Seasonal Realm. These can be obtained from any World Tier, with the exception of . This item like other Uber Rare Uniques can only drop in World Tier 4 from monsters level 85+. We've added more dynamic loading screens with the release of Season of the Malignant. This includes adding more assets to the loading screen, such as your player character. World Tier III Example: World Tier IV Example: We’re increasing the availability of the Affixes below to make them easier to include in different builds. With this absolute massive patch coming, the game as we know it is going to shift quite a bit! The will be breaking down all parts of this patch down into Seasonal Guides in our Resources menu, (with season release), updated , and more that you have come to expect from us. Some of these guides may take a little more time than others due to the tight window of the content being released, but rest assured we are working around the clock to get this out to you. With that said, head over to our and select the D4 role in to stay up to date with our content development to make the most of your Season 1 experience! Written by: Reviewed by:
